item.title: Biden says he could have beaten Trump if he had stayed in the election
item.description: Polls showed Biden falling behind Trump before he stepped aside, and that he lost ground after a shaky debate performance in June.

item.title: Advocates hold ‘day of action’ on Capitol Hill to protest RFK Jr.
Live updates: Trump to huddle with Senate Republicans on early legislative strategy
item.description: Get the latest news on the transition to the new administration of President-elect Donald Trump and the new Congress.

item.title: 2024 turnout is near the 2020 record. See how each state compares.
item.description: Votes are still being counted in some states, but those tabulated so far and expected totals show a range of turnout across states.

item.title: Mexican president jabs at Trump over plan to rename Gulf of Mexico
